text.title: Calculate an Annual Percentage Growth Rate

head.s: Calculate an Annual Percentage Growth Rate

p.s: Annual percentage growth rates are useful when considering investment opportunities .
Municipalities , schools and other groups also use the annual growth rate of populations to predict needs for buildings , services , etc.
As important and useful as these statistics are , it is not difficult to calculate annual percentage growth rates .

item.s: Get the starting value .
To calculate the growth rate , you 're going to need the starting value .
The starting value is the population , revenue , or whatever metric you 're considering at the beginning of the year .

head.s: Calculating Annual Growth over Multiple Years

item.s: Get the starting value .
To calculate the growth rate , you 're going to need the starting value .
The starting value is the population , revenue , or whatever metric you 're considering at the beginning of the period .

item.s: For example , if the revenue of a company is $ 10,000 at the beginning of the period , then the starting value is 10,000 .

To calculate the annual growth , you 'll not only need the starting value , you 'll also need the final value .
That value is the population , revenue , or whatever metric you 're considering at the end of the period .

Determine the number of years .
Since you 're measuring the growth rate for a series of years , you 'll need to know the number of years during the period .
